nodes.text: The Galactic Spice Mining Guild was a spice mining organization fronted by the kingpin Groff Zugga, who served as a guild boss on the planet Mon Gazza. Under Zugga's leadership, Mon Gazza was second only to the planet Kessel in spice production.

The Galactic Spice Mining Guild was created for the 1999 video game Star Wars Episode I: Racer. Although it was given a fleeting mention within the home computer port of the game, the guild was not identified by name. Rather, the guild's history and name were provided by the game's strategy guides.
